duties_responsibilities.duty: Guide the development of Cybersecurity policy, network, and cybersecurity architecture, implementation plans, certification, and accreditation for tactical network systems.
Perform regular duties at Aberdeen Proving Ground and travel up to 50%.
Familiarity with DoD network and cyber security standards – guiding the development of Cybersecurity policy, requirements, engineering, and certification, and accreditation.
Understanding of Risk Management Framework (RMF) requirements, DISA STIGs, and application of FIPS 140-2 compliance and NIST framework principles.
Hands-on experience with cyber security tools employed within DoD architectures.
Experience with scripting languages (Python, Java, Powershell) and incident handling processes.
Implement and enforce security policies across the organization as well as install, test, and evaluate cyber security products.
Good written and oral communications skills and the ability to produce documentation, briefing materials, and network diagrams.

education_certification.credential: Current DoD 8570 certifications for IAT Level III or IAM Level II
